message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this small piece and we can call it a day.
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. A fair deal!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  It's a better deal for you than the last round, and we can finally be done with this.
I'm willing to compromise too, Alice. 70% for me, 30% for you. It's the best I can do.
